document.masterDocTitle: A review of Chelonian type specimens (order Testudines)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of Chelonian type specimens (order Testudines)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype :
QM J51275 ( Shea & Sadlier 1999:17 ; photographed in the original description, p. 81, Fig. 2, and in Cann 1998:249 and Cann & Sadlier 2017:247 );
paratypes
(6), AMS 134981-82, 138839-42 ( Shea & Sadlier 1999:18 ); and QM J51274 (photographed in the original description, p. 83, Fig. 2, and in Cann 1998:249 and Cann & Sadlier 2017:247 ). A male and a female paratype (Museum number not recorded) were photographed when alive (Cann 1988:252-253).

paragraph.emphasis:
Emydura gunaleni Smales, McCord, Cann
, & Joseph-Ouni 2019:24

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype
: AMNH 178722 (photographed in the original description, Pl. 46);
paratype
(1), AMNH 178723.

Holotype :
MNHN 9409 (
Cogger et al. 1983:63
; photographed in Cann 1998:101 and Cann & Sadlier 2017:272 ).

Syntypes
(3): BMNH 1947.3.5.97-99 (formerly 1858.12.8.6, 1846.5.23.4, and 1856.12.3.8); BMNH 1947.3.5.97 designated lectotype by
Cogger et al. (1983:63)
and photographed in Cann (1998:104) .

Holotype :
ZMB 34102
(
Cogger et al. 1983:63
;
Fritz et al. 1994:160
).
ZMB 34103
listed as “ syntype ” (=
paratype
) and both
ZMB 34102
and 34103 photographed in
Goode et al. (1967:60)
, Cann (1998:107 –08), and Cann & Sadlier (2017:282) .

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype
: AMS 44816 (photographed in Cann & Sadlier 2017:297 ); no paratypes designated.
